mapper.insert: insert into insure_question ( question_id, writer_id, insure_title, insure_code, info_open, question_title, question_content, hospital_type, treatement_days, reg_date, last_update_date ) values (0, 1, #{insureTitle}, #{insureCode}, #{informationOpen}, #{questionTitle}, #{questionContent}, #{hospitalType}, #{treatementDays}, now(), now() )
